scripts.build: pnpm --filter @fe-infra/keystone-design-tokens run build 2>/dev/null || true && pnpm --filter @fe-infra/keystone-react run build 2>/dev/null || true && vite build && node scripts/build-all.js
scripts.build:keystone: pnpm --filter @fe-infra/keystone-locales run build 2>/dev/null || true && pnpm --filter @byted-keystone/react-output-target run build 2>/dev/null || true && pnpm --filter @byted-keystone/vue-output-target run build 2>/dev/null || true && pnpm --filter @fe-infra/keystone run build:stencil 2>/dev/null || true && pnpm --filter @fe-infra/keystone-react run build 2>/dev/null || true
